name: COOLFluiD
tagline: Component-based HPC for CFD, plasma and multi-physics simulations.
body:
COOLFluiD
=========

The COOLFluiD (Computational Object-Oriented Libraries for Fluid Dynamics) platform, whose development started in 2002 at the Von Karman Institute, is finally open!

A recent presentation of the project at the NASA Advanced Supercomputing Center is available at
[Applied Modeling & Simulation Seminars @NASA Ames](http://www.nas.nasa.gov/publications/ams/2014/07-17-14.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
